column1: The Pit Room////In town for the otc show and looking for bbq. Went to yelp for ideas and the reviews. Spotted Pit Room and figured it was worth a shot. Turned out to be incredible. Brisket
column7: and two or three sausage choices. Went for the three meat meal with two sides
column8: couldn't go wrong. Everything was excellent
column10: sausage all done with just the right amount of smoke and very juicy. Well worth the trip to check out.
